# Lognormal

> Lognormal distribution.


<section class="usage">

## Usage

``` javascript
var lognormal = require( '@stdlib/math/base/dist/lognormal' );
```

#### lognormal

Lognormal distribution.

``` javascript
var dist = lognormal;
// returns {...}
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->
